title: ‘Love Island’s S2 Premiere Date Has Been Announced & You Bet Flanter Is Fast Approaching
text:
I usually reserve Monday nights for hangover shrapnel and existential crises but, following the announcement that Love Island‘s second season will be premiering Monday October 7, I guess I’ll need to make some room. That’s just about a fortnight away, meaning that juicy flanter is fast incoming. My gossip-parched soul is impatient.

Love Island took to IG to share the news. “THIS IS NOT A DRILL,” their caption reads. “Your Monday October 7 just got better! Please try to remain calm while #LoveIslandAU makes its way to your screen.”

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Love Island Australia (@loveislandau) on Sep 21, 2019 at 4:07pm PDT

Me trying to remain calm:

Rumours are already beginning to fly in regards to potential season 2 cast-members, like Married At First Sight (MAFS) bride Jessika Power. Time will tell, but please, for the love of God, can all of the islanders please be single and not have secret outside relationships? I’m looking at you, Grant.
description: Love Island Australia's season two premiere date has been announced, and it looks like we're going to be getting a whole lotta lovin' very soon.
